price: بېشکه موږ د هغوى د ازمويښت لپاره يوه اوښه لېږونکي يو، نو ته يې (اى صالحه) انتظار كوه او صبر وكړه.
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
